properties.entry: SELECT MENU_NAME, MENU_PRICE FROM TBL_MENU WHERE ORDERABLE_STATUS='Y'
SELECT T.MENU_NAME, T.MENU_PRICE , T.CATEGORY_CODE, T.ORDERABLE_STATUS, C.CATEGORY_NAME FROM TBL_MENU T JOIN TBL_CATEGORY C ON (C.CATEGORY_CODE=T.CATEGORY_CODE) WHERE T.MENU_CODE = ?
UPDATE TBL_MENU SET MENU_PRICE = ?, ORDERABLE_STATUS =? WHERE MENU_CODE = ?
UPDATE TBL_MENU SET ORDERABLE_STATUS ='N' WHERE MENU_CODE = ?
